name: YouTube pinkMEnizer
description:
Pink Theme for ladies ;) Różowy styl dla YouTube.
- pink layout 
- new toolbars
- new look for HTML5 Player
- scrollbars
- new awesome progress bar

Please send me an opinion about colors in login mode, because I don't have an account on YouTube.
additional_info:

- small fix
Version 2.1 - 19.07.2014
- fixed background color in theater mode
Version 2.0 - 18.07.2014
- fixed ticker color

- fixed some colors

Version 1.1 - 10.06.2014

Version 1.0
